name: Polybius (itch) (TheCreator)
description:
In Polybius you control an ever changing polygonal object in four dimensions

Polybius is a top down shooter that won't only test your aiming, but also your multi tasking skills, set in a whole two two dimensional dimensions!

This was a project I made for my first year in University the total time to make this game was about 4 days, so if you find any bugs do let me know!
